entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 10 except 6 near Lake Huron. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High 10 except 6 near Lake Huron. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
